live_updates: A major fault in our northern service has been found. This incident will be closed, please follow this link for all future updates.https://bit.ly/3wswXcX
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
35829.summary: Some customers in Dawson Creek are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
35829.title: Apr 5 – Dawson Creek | All Services - Outage (Resolved)

35831.affected_area: All areas between Whitecourt AB to Fort St. Johns BC
live_updates: Crews have begun repairing the damaged lines. We estimate 3 to 4 hours before local services will be restored. We thank you for your continued patience.

Our field crews have discovered that the fiber optic backbone passing through the city of Whitecourt has been damaged by third parties. Our crews have begun to assess the extent of the damage and will begin repairs as soon as possible. Thank you
Our teams have identified a major fault with our services feeding many northern communities. Technicians are en route to locate the fault. Please stay tuned for updates.
35831.summary: Some customers in the northern regions of Alberta and British Columbia are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. Impacted areas include but are not limited too Whitecourt, Grande Prairie, Barrhead, Dawson Creek, Fort St. Johns and all surrounding communities. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
35831.title: April 5 - Northwestern Alberta and Northeastern BC (Whitecourt to Fort St Johns) | Service Outage (Fix in Progress)

live_updates: All services have been restored. We apologize for the inconvenience.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.

35833.title: April 5 - Kamloops (Dufferin/Aberdeen) | Service Outage (Resolved)

live_updates: Issue has been resolved. All services are restored.
